title: Retrieve a UK property business annual submission
description: Retrieve a UK property business annual submission

submittedOn.description: The date the UK property was submitted, in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ

ukFhlProperty.description: Object holding the adjustments and allowances of the user's Furnished Holiday Letting (FHL) in the United Kingdom.

adjustments.description: Object holding UK FHL Property Adjustments.

lossBroughtForward.description: Loss brought forward from earlier years. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

privateUseAdjustment.description: Any expenses incurred not solely for the property business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

balancingCharge.description: A charge for an item, for which capital allowance was claimed, but has since been sold, given away or is no longer in use. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

periodOfGraceAdjustment.description: A boolean to identify  a property which didn't qualify for FHL this year but qualified the previous year. The value must be true or false.

businessPremisesRenovationAllowanceBalan.description: Income from the sale or grant of a long lease for a premium of renovated business premises within 7 years of first use. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nonResidentLandlord.description: A boolean to identify  that the user is a Non-Resident Landlord. The value must be true or false.

rentARoom.description: Object holding UK FHL Rent A Room income shared.

jointlyLet.description: A boolean to identify that the Rent A Room income (RAR) is shared with another individual. The value must be true or false.

allowances.description: Object holding UK FHL Property Allowances.

annualInvestmentAllowance.description: The amount claimed on equipment bought (except cars) up to maximum annual amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

businessPremisesRenovationAllowance.description: The allowance amount for renovation or conversion of derelict business properties. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherCapitalAllowance.description: All other capital allowances. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

propertyIncomeAllowance.description: The amount of Tax exemption for individuals with income from land or property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

electricChargePointAllowance.description: The expenditure incurred on electric charge-point equipment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

zeroEmissionsCarAllowance.description: The amount of zero emissions car allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

ukNonFhlProperty.description: Object holding allowances and adjustments for UK property business - excluding Furnished Holiday Lettings (FHL) - for the period.

adjustments.description: Object holding UK Non FHL Property Adjustments.

lossBroughtForward.description: Loss brought forward from earlier years. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

balancingCharge.description: If an item for which capital allowance was claimed has been sold, given away or is no longer in use. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

privateUseAdjustment.description: Any expenses incurred that were not solely for the property business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

businessPremisesRenovationAllowanceBalan.description: Income from the sale or grant of a long lease for a premium of renovated business premises within 7 years of first use. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nonResidentLandlord.description: A boolean to identify that the user is a Non-Resident Landlord. The value must be true or false.

rentARoom.description: Object holding Non UK FHL Rent A Room income shared.

jointlyLet.description: A boolean to identify that the Rent A Room income (RAR) is shared with another individual. The value must be true or false.

allowances.description: Object holding UK Non FHL Property Allowances.

annualInvestmentAllowance.description: The amount claimed on equipment bought (except cars) up to maximum annual amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

zeroEmissionGoodsVehicleAllowance.description: The amount of zero emission goods vehicle allowance for goods vehicles purchased for business use. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

businessPremisesRenovationAllowance.description: Allowance for renovation or conversion of derelict business properties. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherCapitalAllowance.description: All other capital allowances. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

costOfReplacingDomesticGoods.description: Cost of Replacing Domestic Items - formerly Wear and Tear allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

propertyIncomeAllowance.description: The amount of Tax exemption for individuals with income from land or property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

electricChargePointAllowance.description: The expenditure incurred on electric charge-point equipment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

amount.description: The amount of structured building allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

firstYear.description: Object holding UK Non FHL structured building allowance details.

qualifyingDate.description: The date qualified for structured building allowance. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DD.

qualifyingAmountExpenditure.description: The amount of qualifying expenditure. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

building.description: Object holding UK Non FHL structured building details. Post code is mandatory and minimum one of name and number field must be supplied.

enhancedStructuredBuildingAllowance.description: Details about enhanced structured building allowance.

amount.description: The amount of enhanced structured building allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

firstYear.description: Object holding UK Non FHL enhanced structured building allowance details.

qualifyingDate.description: The date qualified for enhanced structured building allowance. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DD.

qualifyingAmountExpenditure.description: The amount of qualifying expenditure. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

building.description: Object holding UK Non FHL enhanced structured building details. Post code is mandatory and minimum one of name and number field must be supplied.

zeroEmissionsCarAllowance.description: The amount of zero emissions car allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource.
